title: How to create a classroom teacher in Google Classroom - Quora

response.answer_text: Starting with this question I will direct you to use Google Classroom’s extensive support. Videos, articles covering every detail in useable segments. Google Classroom Training | Teacher Center | Google for Education With that like so many different school / company wide applications this one is tiered - administrator, teacher, student. Each can only do what is authorized by the level they are at. Using my school district as an example, we have a number of people that are registered as admin. The school uses its Google email address as the thread that ties everything in the school district together. Teachers then using their school email account sign in to Google Classroom, set up their individual account (within the school district’s) and clicks on the appropriate icon to create their first class. You can then connect others teachers to your classroom through the People tab and “add teacher” if you work collaboratively
